an10.25:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these ten universal dimensions of meditation.
an10.25:4.3: Someone perceives the meditation on universal earth above, below, across, non-dual and limitless.
an10.25:4.4: They perceive the meditation on universal water …
an10.25:4.12: They perceive the meditation on universal consciousness above, below, across, non-dual and limitless.
an10.25:4.13: These are the ten universal dimensions of meditation.”
